## Developer Guide

If you are new to using `nbdev` here are some useful pointers to get you
started.

### Install date_helper in Development mode

``` sh
# make sure date_helper package is installed in development mode
$ pip install -e .

# make changes under nbs/ directory
# ...

# compile to have changes apply to date_helper
$ nbdev_prepare
```

## Usage

### Installation

Install latest from the GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/tw13023/date-helper):

``` sh
$ pip install git+https://github.com/tw13023/date-helper.git
```

or from [conda](https://anaconda.org/tw13023/date-helper)

``` sh
$ conda install -c tw13023 date_helper
```

or from [pypi](https://pypi.org/project/date-helper/)

``` sh
$ pip install date_helper
```

### Documentation

Documentation can be found hosted on this GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/tw13023/date-helper)’s
[pages](https://tw13023.github.io/date-helper/). Additionally you can
find package manager specific guidelines on
[conda](https://anaconda.org/tw13023/date-helper) and
[pypi](https://pypi.org/project/date-helper/) respectively.
